info.author: Tim Wegener
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
These tools are used as a frontend for or to provide input to mkisofs.
Main goals:
    * make ISO images that are verifiable at the individual file level
    * provide support for splitting data across multiple disc images
    * preserve file ownerships and permissions as much as possible
info.keywords: cd dvd archiving verifiable backup sysadmin
info.name: disc_tools
info.summary: Package for creating verifiable CD/DVD images.
info.html_description:
These tools are used as a frontend for or to provide input to mkisofs.
Main goals:
* make ISO images that are verifiable at the individual file level
* provide support for splitting data across multiple disc images
* preserve file ownerships and permissions as much as possible
